```{r}
filename <- file.choose()
crime <- readRDS(filename)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
crime1 <- filter(crime, OFFENSE=='02 ' | OFFENSE=='20 ' | OFFENSE =='17 ') 
write.csv(crime1, file="./data/crime.csv")
```


```{r}
filename <- file.choose()

write.csv(twitter, file="./data/twitter_example.csv")
```
